snippet: After R.J. Allen was not penalized for an apparent hand ball, he quickly capitalized, assisting on David Villa’s opening goal in the 2-1 victory.
lead_paragraph: After R.J. Allen was not penalized for an apparent hand ball, he quickly capitalized, assisting on David Villa’s opening goal in the 2-1 victory.

headline.main: One Disputed Assist, and Three Straight Wins for N.Y.C.F.C.
